item.title: Jaeger
item.description: Jaeger 一款uber贡献给cncf的微服务tracing监控工具. https://www.jaegertracing.io/ https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger Deploy Jaeger on K8S https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger-kubernetes

item.title: Sentry
item.description: Sentry https://github.com/getsentry/sentry Deploy Sentry on K8S https://github.com/getsentry/onpremise

item.title: Tracing
item.description: Tracing APM 监控，也叫全链路监控。 sentry https://github.com/getsentry/sentry zipkin https://github.com/openzipkin/zipkin open-telemetry opentracing和opencensus 合并成open-telemetry. https://github.com/opentracing https://github.com/census-instrumentation https://github.com/open-telemetry jaeger https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger
